misuse: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
vulnerable_code:
SecureRandom random = new SecureRandom();
String defaultKey = String.valueOf(random.ints());
description: The use of random.ints() may not provide a sufficiently random value for generating a cryptographic key. This can weaken the encryption strength.
recommendation: Use a more reliable method to generate a random key, such as SecureRandom.nextBytes().
